TopicTitle: Allow SC-9001 to be closed for reentry

Articles.Content:
It makes very little sense to reenter with the doors of the science bay open. I'd like to suggest that the doors be allowed to be closed, while retaining the experiment, for reentry.

Is there a cfg edit or anything that I can do to fix this in the meantime.

You can set up an action group to toggle the doors of the science bay (and goo containers if you've got them). It does make sense for this function to be added as an option to the right click context menu though.
you can bind the toggle for opening/closing the doors in the Action Groups. It's weird that there isn't a clickable option for that on the module itself in-flight.
